original_title: The Roots of Revenge from Wasseypur
overview: The complete making of ultimate revenge saga "GANGS OF WASSEYPUR". Returning to childhood, returning to our heartland, returning to the music in a journey through the making of Gangs Of Wasseypur. An extensive, in-depth account of the making of the film through the eyes of Anurag kashyap, the cast and the crew of Gangs of Wasseypur.
title: The Roots of Revenge from Wasseypur
